analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/21/0x9e3bc95b13bd00e3b3fecaa02c3e78469d31fbf4.sol#371-378):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/21/0x9e3bc95b13bd00e3b3fecaa02c3e78469d31fbf4.sol#374-375)
	- token.transferOwnership(_to) (/unique_chucks/21/0x9e3bc95b13bd00e3b3fecaa02c3e78469d31fbf4.sol#376-378)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleClosed (/unique_chucks/21/0x9e3bc95b13bd00e3b3fecaa02c3e78469d31fbf4.sol)

Crowdsale.externalPurchase (/unique_chucks/21/0x9e3bc95b13bd00e3b3fecaa02c3e78469d31fbf4.sol#357-371) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/21/0x9e3bc95b13bd00e3b3fecaa02c3e78469d31fbf4.sol#367)

Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/21/0x9e3bc95b13bd00e3b3fecaa02c3e78469d31fbf4.sol#371-378) does not use the value returned by external calls:
